DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Xalacom And Xalatan In Patients With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma ( POAG ) Or Ocular Hypertension ( OH ) .
DOC.criteria: Intraocular pressure 18 mmHg baseline treatment Xalatan 4 week . History noresponse timolol History trabeculectomy History ocular surgery include ALT , SLT , trabeculotomy within 6 month
